E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/13/1973
Subject: Status of Lowell Palmer
Dear Sir,
Lowell Palmer has an ERA of 5.58 at AA Waterbury Dodgers.
I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/14/1973
Subject: Progress of Clarence Milsap
Dear Sir,
Clarence Milsap is hitting the ball well at A Daytona Beach Dodgers!
He has an AVG of .314, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/15/1973
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Jeff James



Date: Monday, 5/20/1973
Subject: Progress of Tim Blackwell
Dear Sir,
Tim Blackwell has nothing more to prove at A Daytona Beach Dodgers!
He has an AVG of .319 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
